AvroToJsonStringSerializer - Class in org.kiji.rest.serializers
Avro's specific types don't seem to serialize properly so this class provides the necessary hook to convert an Avro SpecificRecordBase to a Json string literal meant to be embedded in another JSON object sent back to the client.
AvroToJsonStringSerializer() - Constructor for class org.kiji.rest.serializers.AvroToJsonStringSerializer

O

org.kiji.rest - package org.kiji.rest
The main package for KijiREST
org.kiji.rest.config - package org.kiji.rest.config
Contains configuration holder classes for Kiji Rest.
org.kiji.rest.health - package org.kiji.rest.health
Contains REST health checks for Kiji.
org.kiji.rest.plugins - package org.kiji.rest.plugins
Contains plugins for KijiREST.
org.kiji.rest.representations - package org.kiji.rest.representations
Contains representation classes used for GETting/POSTing resources.
org.kiji.rest.resources - package org.kiji.rest.resources
Contains resources that respond to REST requests.
org.kiji.rest.serializers - package org.kiji.rest.serializers
Contains custom object to JSON serializers.
org.kiji.rest.util - package org.kiji.rest.util
Utility classes for KijiREST.

U

Utf8ToJsonSerializer - Class in org.kiji.rest.serializers
Avro's specific types don't seem to serialize properly so this class provides the necessary hook to convert an Avro SpecificRecordBase to a Json object that can properly be serialized and sent back to the client.
Utf8ToJsonSerializer() - Constructor for class org.kiji.rest.serializers.Utf8ToJsonSerializer
